posts.post_content:
I can't add much to what's been already said, except that as broken as this card is, its even MORE broken when you're playing something with heavy graveyard recursion. "Oh no, my [Ulamog's Crusher](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ulamog's Crusher) was in the pile I didn't choose? Damn, and here I only managed to get two [Exhume](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Exhume)s from the one I did choose."  
  
Repeat for various other graveyard-dependent effects. Threshold springs to mind.
